sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from [dbo].[sales] 
where cast(date as DATE) >= '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.windowStart, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm' )}' 
AND cast(date as DATE) < '@{formatDateTime(pipeline().parameters.windowEnd, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm' )}'

content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://pocioblake.dfs.core.windows.net/pociobprimaryfs/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET' 
    ) AS [result]

CREATE TABLE tbWaterMarkControl
(
	 TableControled VARCHAR,
	 WatermarkValue datetime
)
